dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: plotContributor
dataModel.author: John Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a party contributing to a vegetation plot.
entity.entityDescription: This table serves as an interesection entity used to 'link' a party with a specific vegetation plot.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a party contributing to a vegetation plot.

attribute.attNotes: This is the foreign key into the plot table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a given plot this is a link to the project entity.

attribute.attNotes: This is the foreign key into the PARTY table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a given party this is a link to the party entity.
The role that a specific party (party_id) had in the plot collection - this can include such roles as PI, contact, author, etc. This will be linked to an entity named:
